description: From en- +‎ sconce, “to place in a sconce (“fortification”)”.

verbs.description: ensconce (third-person singular simple present ensconces, present participle ensconcing, simple past and past participle ensconced)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To place in a secure environment.

examples: […]  Major was already ensconced on his bed of straw, under a lantern which hung from a beam.
